comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The Paris pictures are all of  the same group of wounded soldiers.

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: The battle of Charleroi was fought in August, 1914. Here is a better-exposed print of the same negative (though less tightly cropped) from Agence Meurisse, in the Gallica online archive, dated 1914: gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b90415184

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: artolog: Thank you for the finding the matching image on the Gallica site. We will add the date and other information to the image description.
